enable.description: A flag indicating this command should be run.  Setting to false will skip the mapping entirely.

leftComponents.description: Components used for creation of left objects

handleList.description: List of handles used to create left list of objects

tagNames.description: List of tags that will be used to create left list of objects

objectType.description: Type of the left object. Will be used as a filter

rightComponents.description: Components used for creation of right objects

handleList.description: List of handles used to create right list of objects

tagNames.description: List of tags that will be used to create right list of objects

objectType.description: Type of the right object. Will be used as a filter

mapPattern.description: Pattern for mapping the left and right list together. Possible choices: PAIR, BACKBONE, ROUND_ROBIN, CUSTOM.

parentTagName.description: Tag name of the parent of the middle object from BuildPairObjectCommand. Property will be chained in to BuildPairObjectCommand. Possible Choices: LEFT, RIGHT, PROJECT, . Only works with BuildPairObjectCommand.

customPattern.description: Components used for configuration of custom mapping. The custom pattern uses the start/step/repeat/recycle idiom on the left list of objects and the right list of objects. The start/step/repeat/recycle will generate indices that will be used to the index within the left objects and right objects. The indices start at 0.

leftStart.description: Start value for left list (0 based index)

leftStep.description: Step amount each iteration in the left list

leftRepeat.description: Number of times to repeat current iteration object in left list (0 for no repeats)

leftRecycle.description: Number of unique indices in left list

rightStart.description: Start value for right list (0 based index)

rightStep.description: Step amount each iteration in the right list

rightRepeat.description: Number of times to repeat current iteration object in right list (0 for no repeats)

rightRecycle.description: Number of unique indices in right list

count.description: Number of pairs the pattern will have

RunPairScriptCommand.title: Schema for InputJson of the spirent.methodology.RunPairScriptCommand.

leftTagName.description: Tag of the left object that the relation will be created between. This property is chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_LEFT_TAG_NAME

rightTagName.description: Tag of the right object that the relation will be created between. This property is chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_RIGHT_TAG_NAME

scriptFileName.description: Location and filename (without the py extension) of the python script to be executed.

methodName.description: Method in the python script to be executed.

tagName.description: Name of the tag associated with the target object(s).

params.description: Parameters passed to the script for it to work with.

errorMsg.description: Last error message recorded by the command.

leftTagName.description: Tag of the left object that the relation will be created between. This property is REQUIRED and can be chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_LEFT_TAG_NAME

rightTagName.description: Tag of the right object that the relation will be created between. This property is REQUIRED and can be chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_RIGHT_TAG_NAME

templateXml.description: Template to use as a string

enableLoadFromFileName.description: Whether or not to load from a file or templateXml (true to load from file)

leftTemplateTagName.description: Optional tag that will be used to search the template for needed relations on the left side

rightTemplateTagName.description: Optional tag that will be used to search the template for neede relations on the right side

leftTagName.description: Tag of the left object that the relation will be created between. This property is REQUIRED and can be chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_LEFT_TAG_NAME

rightTagName.description: Tag of the right object that the relation will be created between. This property is REQUIRED and can be chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in, the tag will be CHAINED_RIGHT_TAG_NAME

midTemplateTagName.description: Template tag used to find middle object within the given template

parentTagName.description: Tag of object that will become parent of the newly created middle object. This property can be chained in from MapWhileCommand. When chained in the tag can be CHAINED_LEFT_TAG_NAME, CHAINED_RIGHT_TAG_NAME, CHAINED_PROJECT_TAG_NAME, or a . Default:

templateXml.description: Template to use as a string

enableLoadFromFileName.description: Whether or not to load from a file or templateXml (true to load from file). Default: true

leftTemplateTagName.description: Optional tag that will be used to search the template for needed relations on the left side

rightTemplateTagName.description: Optional tag that will be used to search the template for neede relations on the right side
